description:
A Stand user named after Youssou N`Dour, a Senegalese artist. He appears as a blind man leaning on a cane and uses his sensitive hearing to track his opponent. His Stand is Geb, an extremely fast stand of water.
After his defeat he committed suicide, shooting himself through the head with a high-pressure water jet, lest he "slip" any secret of Dio to protagonists.
name: N`doul
